text: Panasion was a town of ancient Phrygia, inhabited in Roman and Byzantine times. Its site is located near Banaz in Asiatic Turkey. ==References== Category:Populated places in Phrygia Category:Former populated places in Turkey Category:Roman towns and cities in Turkey Category:Populated places of the Byzantine Empire Category:History of Uşak Province Category:Populated places in Banaz District
title: Panasion
